means: <利未记>（基督教圣经<旧约全书>中的一卷）

sentence.Network_en: The book of Leviticus, in the Bible, tells us about religious law.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣经中的《利未记》向我们讲了有关宗教的法律.

sentence.Network_en: Nine times these words are repeated in Leviticus.
sentence.Network_cn: 在利未记里这些话反复述说了有九次之多.

sentence.Network_en: Leviticus 18:22 - No man is to have sexual relations with another man; God hates that.
sentence.Network_cn: 利未记18:22-不可与男人苟合,象与女人一样; 这本是可憎恶的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: levite 莱维特, leviticus 利未记, levitical 利未族的

means.word_mean: 1. the third book of the Old Testament; contains Levitical law and ritual precedents

auth_sentence.content: Like the house in Leviticus, he had been infested with plague: they scraped him clean and took him apart, stone by stone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like the house in Leviticus, he had been infested with plague: they scraped him clean and took him apart, stone by stone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like the house in Leviticus, he had been infested with plague: they scraped him clean and took him apart, stone by stone.

auth_sentence.content: Rondell Reed, 52, escaped with his cellmate, Leviticus Taylor, Monday from the Indian County Jail, officials said.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rondell Reed, 52, escaped with his cellmate, Leviticus Taylor, Monday from the Indian County Jail, officials said.
